name: Starman 2050
description:
You are Starman

Launched by SpaceX in 2018, you have been under cryogenic stasis until today. You are a top secret agent armed only with your Tesla Roadster. You need to destroy an AI based civilization called The Gates. The Gates are on a collision course with Earth. If you fail, Elon Musk will be annoyed.

(This was the final project for a class I was taking. Made in a few days, essentially, this is from a game jam. Source code: https://github.com/robrohan/starman50 )
